Class ParalyseEffect

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.effects.Effect
sk.stuba.fiit.effects.ParalyseEffect
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Tickable
public class ParalyseEffect extends Effect
ParalyseEffect disables the player's ability to attack with weapons. It temporarily overrides the player's RangedAttackingStrategy with a no-op strategy.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ParalyseEffect(boolean isFinite, float duration, float remainingTime, Entity target)
    Constructs a ParalyseEffect with full control over its parameters.
    ParalyseEffect(boolean isFinite, float duration, Entity target)
    Constructs a ParalyseEffect assuming remaining time is equal to full duration.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    applyEffect()
    Applies the paralysis effect by overriding the player's attacking strategy with a dummy strategy that performs no attack.
    Effect
    clone()
    Creates a clone of this effect with identical configuration, but without a target.
    void
    removeEffect()
    Restores the player's original attacking strategy after the effect expires.

  • Constructor Details

    • ParalyseEffect

      public ParalyseEffect(boolean isFinite, float duration, float remainingTime, Entity target)
      Constructs a ParalyseEffect with full control over its parameters.
      Parameters:
      isFinite - whether the effect expires after a duration
      duration - how long the effect lasts in total
      remainingTime - how much time is left when the effect is applied
      target - the target entity affected by the effect

    • ParalyseEffect

      public ParalyseEffect(boolean isFinite, float duration, Entity target)
      Constructs a ParalyseEffect assuming remaining time is equal to full duration.
      Parameters:
      isFinite - whether the effect expires after a duration
      duration - how long the effect lasts
      target - the target entity affected
